 1997-02361997-02-180,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP
PrecisAppointment of LUDMILA PERGAT, of Granby, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective February 24, 1997.
